name: Invasion Location
description: Two aliens, Zrop and Floogle, want to invade a planet, but they can't agree on which one. Zrop wants to invade mars, and Floogle wants to invade earth. Grab a friend, each play as one of the aliens, and try to steer the flying saucer towards your planet by clicking faster than your opponent. Made for Mini Jam, the theme is space and the design constraint is only mouse input.
